recipes.name: Gufran Khan
recipes.instructions:
1. Wash rice and dal separately
2. Cook rice with 2 cups water until soft
3. Pressure cook dal with turmeric and salt
4. Mix cooked dal with rice
5. Serve hot with ghee

recipes.name: TESTY
recipes.instructions:
1. Wash rice and dal separately
2. Cook rice with 2 cups water until soft
3. Pressure cook dal with turmeric and salt
4. Mix cooked dal with rice
5. Serve hot with ghee

recipes.name: THIS IS FOR AUTOREFRESH
recipes.instructions:
1. Wash rice and dal separately
2. Cook rice with 2 cups water until soft
3. Pressure cook dal with turmeric and salt
4. Mix cooked dal with rice
5. Serve hot with ghee

recipes.name: TEST RECIPE FROM GITHUB
recipes.instructions:
1. Wash rice and dal separately
2. Cook rice with 2 cups water until soft
3. Pressure cook dal with turmeric and salt
4. Mix cooked dal with rice
5. Serve hot with ghee

recipes.name: Dal Rice
recipes.instructions:
1. Wash rice and dal separately
2. Cook rice with 2 cups water until soft
3. Pressure cook dal with turmeric and salt
4. Mix cooked dal with rice
5. Serve hot with ghee

recipes.name: Aloo Sabzi
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut potatoes into cubes
2. Heat oil, add cumin seeds
3. Add chopped onions, cook until golden
4. Add potatoes, turmeric, salt
5. Cover and cook for 15-20 minutes
6. Serve hot with roti

recipes.name: Rajma
recipes.instructions:
1. Pressure cook soaked rajma for 4-5 whistles
2. Heat oil, add cumin seeds
3. Add onions, cook until brown
4. Add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes
5. Add cooked rajma with water
6. Simmer for 15 minutes
7. Serve with rice

recipes.name: Chole
recipes.instructions:
1. Pressure cook soaked chickpeas
2. Heat oil in pan
3. Add onions, cook until golden
4. Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes
5. Add chole masala and spices
6. Add cooked chickpeas
7. Cook for 15 minutes
8. Garnish with coriander

recipes.name: Paneer Curry
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut paneer into cubes
2. Make paste of tomatoes and onions
3. Heat oil, add the paste
4. Cook until oil separates
5. Add paneer cubes gently
6. Add cream and spices
7. Simmer for 5 minutes
8. Serve hot

recipes.name: Biryani
recipes.instructions:
1. Soak rice for 30 minutes
2. Marinate meat with yogurt and spices
3. Cook meat until 70% done
4. Boil rice until 70% cooked
5. Layer rice and meat alternately
6. Top with fried onions
7. Cook on dum for 45 minutes
8. Serve with raita

recipes.name: Roti
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix flour, salt and oil
2. Add water gradually to make soft dough
3. Rest dough for 15 minutes
4. Roll into small circles
5. Cook on hot tawa until brown spots appear
6. Flip and cook other side
7. Serve hot with curry

recipes.name: Paratha
recipes.instructions:
1. Make dough like roti
2. Roll, apply ghee, fold
3. Roll again into circle
4. Cook on tawa with ghee
5. Press gently while cooking
6. Cook until golden brown
7. Serve hot with pickle

recipes.name: Khichdi
recipes.instructions:
1. Wash rice and dal together
2. Heat ghee, add cumin seeds
3. Add vegetables, cook for 2 minutes
4. Add rice, dal, turmeric
5. Add 4 cups water and salt
6. Cook until soft and mushy
7. Serve hot with ghee

recipes.name: Samosa
recipes.instructions:
1. Make dough with flour and oil
2. Prepare spiced potato filling
3. Roll dough into small circles
4. Cut in half, make cone
5. Fill with potato mixture
6. Seal edges with water
7. Deep fry until golden
8. Serve hot with chutney

recipes.name: Dosa
recipes.instructions:
1. Soak rice and dal separately for 4 hours
2. Grind to smooth batter
3. Mix and add salt
4. Ferment overnight
5. Heat non-stick pan
6. Pour batter, spread thin
7. Cook until crispy
8. Serve with sambar and chutney

recipes.name: Idli
recipes.instructions:
1. Use fermented dosa batter
2. Grease idli plates with oil
3. Pour batter into molds
4. Steam for 12-15 minutes
5. Check with toothpick
6. Cool for 2 minutes
7. Remove gently
8. Serve with sambar

recipes.name: Poha
recipes.instructions:
1. Wash poha, drain well
2. Heat oil, add peanuts
3. Add curry leaves, onions
4. Add turmeric, salt
5. Add drained poha
6. Mix gently, cook 3 minutes
7. Garnish with coriander
8. Serve hot with lemon

recipes.name: Upma
recipes.instructions:
1. Dry roast semolina until aromatic
2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds
3. Add curry leaves, vegetables
4. Add 3 cups water, bring to boil
5. Slowly add roasted semolina
6. Stir continuously to avoid lumps
7. Cook until thick
8. Serve hot

recipes.name: Pasta
recipes.instructions:
1. Boil pasta in salted water
2. Heat olive oil in pan
3. Add vegetables, cook until tender
4. Add cooked pasta
5. Toss with cheese and herbs
6. Season with salt and pepper
7. Cook for 2 minutes
8. Serve hot

recipes.name: Fried Rice
recipes.instructions:
1. Use day-old cooked rice
2. Heat oil in wok
3. Add garlic, stir for 30 seconds
4. Add vegetables, stir-fry
5. Add rice, break lumps
6. Add soy sauce, mix well
7. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes
8. Serve hot

recipes.name: Maggi
recipes.instructions:
1. Boil 1.5 cups water
2. Add noodles, break into pieces
3. Add vegetables if using
4. Cook for 2 minutes
5. Add masala packet
6. Stir well and cook 1 minute
7. Turn off heat
8. Serve immediately

recipes.name: Sandwich
recipes.instructions:
1. Apply butter on bread slices
2. Spread chutney on one side
3. Layer vegetables and cheese
4. Cover with another slice
5. Heat sandwich maker or pan
6. Grill until golden brown
7. Cut diagonally
8. Serve hot with ketchup

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
recipes.instructions:
1. Marinate chicken with spices
2. Cook chicken until tender
3. Make tomato gravy with butter
4. Add cooked chicken to gravy
5. Add cream and simmer
6. Garnish with coriander
7. Serve with rice or naan

recipes.name: Palak Paneer
recipes.instructions:
1. Blanch spinach and make puree
2. Cut paneer into cubes
3. Cook onions until golden
4. Add spinach puree and spices
5. Add paneer cubes gently
6. Add cream and simmer
7. Serve hot with roti

recipes.name: Pizza
recipes.instructions:
1. Spread sauce on pizza base
2. Add cheese generously
3. Top with vegetables
4. Sprinkle herbs and spices
5. Bake at 200°C for 15 minutes
6. Cut into slices
7. Serve hot

recipes.name: Burger
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook patty until done
2. Toast burger buns
3. Apply sauce on buns
4. Layer lettuce and tomato
5. Place cooked patty
6. Add cheese slice
7. Cover and serve

recipes.name: Omelette
recipes.instructions:
1. Beat eggs with salt
2. Heat oil in pan
3. Add chopped vegetables
4. Pour beaten eggs
5. Cook until bottom sets
6. Fold in half
7. Serve hot

recipes.name: Pav Bhaji
recipes.instructions:
1. Boil and mash vegetables
2. Heat butter in pan
3. Add onions, cook until soft
4. Add mashed vegetables
5. Add pav bhaji masala
6. Cook for 10 minutes
7. Serve with buttered pav

recipes.name: Vada Pav
recipes.instructions:
1. Make spiced potato vada
2. Deep fry until golden
3. Slit pav bread
4. Apply chutneys
5. Place vada inside
6. Serve with fried chilies
7. Enjoy hot

recipes.name: Dhokla
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix gram flour with yogurt
2. Add ginger-chili paste
3. Add eno and mix
4. Steam for 15 minutes
5. Temper with mustard seeds
6. Cut into pieces
7. Serve with chutney

recipes.name: Kachori
recipes.instructions:
1. Make dough with flour
2. Prepare spiced dal filling
3. Roll and stuff dough
4. Seal edges properly
5. Deep fry until golden
6. Serve hot with chutney
7. Enjoy crispy

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.instructions:
1. Marinate chicken with spices
2. Cook onions until golden
3. Add tomatoes and cook
4. Add chicken and cook
5. Add coconut milk
6. Simmer until tender
7. Serve with rice

recipes.name: Fish Curry
recipes.instructions:
1. Clean and cut fish
2. Grind coconut with spices
3. Cook tamarind water
4. Add coconut paste
5. Add fish pieces
6. Cook until done
7. Serve with rice

recipes.name: Mutton Biryani
recipes.instructions:
1. Marinate mutton overnight
2. Cook mutton until tender
3. Parboil rice with spices
4. Layer mutton and rice
5. Top with fried onions
6. Cook on dum for 1 hour
7. Serve with raita

recipes.name: Aloo Gobi
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut potatoes and cauliflower
2. Heat oil, add cumin
3. Add vegetables
4. Add spices and cook
5. Cover and simmer
6. Cook until tender
7. Serve hot

recipes.name: Bhindi Masala
recipes.instructions:
1. Wash and cut okra
2. Heat oil in pan
3. Add okra, fry until crisp
4. Add onions and tomatoes
5. Add spices and cook
6. Mix well and serve
7. Enjoy with roti

recipes.name: Kadhi Pakora
recipes.instructions:
1. Make pakoras and fry
2. Mix yogurt with gram flour
3. Add water and spices
4. Cook until thick
5. Add pakoras
6. Simmer for 10 minutes
7. Serve with rice

recipes.name: Masala Chai
recipes.instructions:
1. Boil water with spices
2. Add tea leaves
3. Add milk and sugar
4. Boil for 2 minutes
5. Strain and serve
6. Enjoy hot
7. Perfect with snacks

recipes.name: Lassi
recipes.instructions:
1. Blend yogurt with sugar
2. Add cardamom powder
3. Add ice cubes
4. Blend until frothy
5. Pour in glasses
6. Garnish with mint
7. Serve chilled

recipes.name: Naan
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix flour with yogurt
2. Add baking powder and salt
3. Knead into soft dough
4. Rest for 2 hours
5. Roll into oval shape
6. Cook on tawa
7. Serve hot with curry

recipes.name: Tandoori Chicken
recipes.instructions:
1. Make cuts in chicken
2. Marinate with yogurt and spices
3. Rest for 4 hours
4. Cook in oven at 200°C
5. Baste with butter
6. Cook until charred
7. Serve with onions

recipes.name: Seekh Kebab
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix mince with spices
2. Add chopped herbs
3. Form around skewers
4. Cook on grill
5. Turn frequently
6. Cook until done
7. Serve with chutney

recipes.name: Rasgulla
recipes.instructions:
1. Curdle milk with lemon
2. Strain and make paneer
3. Knead into smooth dough
4. Make small balls
5. Boil in sugar syrup
6. Cook for 15 minutes
7. Serve chilled

recipes.name: Gulab Jamun
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix milk powder with flour
2. Add ghee and make dough
3. Form small balls
4. Deep fry until golden
5. Soak in sugar syrup
6. Let it absorb syrup
7. Serve warm

recipes.name: Jalebi
recipes.instructions:
1. Make batter with flour and yogurt
2. Ferment overnight
3. Make sugar syrup with saffron
4. Heat oil for frying
5. Pour batter in spiral shape
6. Fry until crispy
7. Dip in syrup and serve

recipes.name: Pani Puri
recipes.instructions:
1. Make spiced mint water
2. Prepare potato filling
3. Make hole in puri
4. Fill with potato
5. Add chutneys
6. Fill with spiced water
7. Eat immediately

recipes.name: Bhel Puri
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix puffed rice with vegetables
2. Add chopped onions and tomatoes
3. Add mint and tamarind chutney
4. Mix well
5. Top with sev
6. Serve immediately
7. Enjoy crunchy snack

recipes.name: Dahi Vada
recipes.instructions:
1. Soak and grind urad dal
2. Make fluffy batter
3. Deep fry vadas
4. Soak in warm water
5. Squeeze and place in yogurt
6. Top with chutneys
7. Serve chilled

recipes.name: Aloo Tikki
recipes.instructions:
1. Boil and mash potatoes
2. Add peas and spices
3. Form into patties
4. Coat with breadcrumbs
5. Shallow fry until golden
6. Serve with chutney
7. Enjoy hot and crispy

recipes.name: Malai Kofta
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix paneer with mashed potato
2. Form balls and fry
3. Make rich tomato gravy
4. Add cream and cashews
5. Add fried koftas
6. Simmer gently
7. Serve with rice

recipes.name: Dum Aloo
recipes.instructions:
1. Boil baby potatoes
2. Prick with fork
3. Fry until golden
4. Make spicy gravy
5. Add potatoes to gravy
6. Cook on dum
7. Serve hot

recipes.name: Baingan Bharta
recipes.instructions:
1. Roast eggplant on flame
2. Peel and mash
3. Heat oil, add onions
4. Add tomatoes and spices
5. Add mashed eggplant
6. Cook until dry
7. Serve with roti

recipes.name: Methi Thepla
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix flour with chopped methi
2. Add yogurt and spices
3. Make soft dough
4. Roll into thin circles
5. Cook on tawa with oil
6. Serve with pickle
7. Perfect for travel

recipes.name: Misal Pav
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook mixed sprouts
2. Make spicy misal gravy
3. Mix sprouts with gravy
4. Serve in bowl
5. Top with onions and farsan
6. Serve with pav
7. Enjoy spicy dish
